plugin.documentation: Use this plugin to build for the flash platform.

configuration.elem: Use this to specify targetPlayer, fps or bgColor of the swf. E.g.:<swf targetPlayer="14" fps="60" bgColor="0x000000" />.

arg.name: -debug
arg.documentation: Use this argument if you want to build in debug.

arg.name: -slimerjs
arg.documentation: Use this argument to make the app run on slimerjs which is a standalone tiny firefox. This has the benefit of not opening a new tab on your browser.

arg.name: -browser
arg.documentation: Use this argument to make the app run on browser. The default is slimerjs.

arg.name: -advanced-telemetry
arg.documentation: Use this argument to make the app run on browser. The default is slimerjs.
